title: Vikram Aggarwal in talks to buy Chennai's Clarion Hotel for Rs 180 crore
description: Vikram Aggarwal to acquire Clarion Hotel in Chennai for ₹180 crore in June. VVA Hotels Pvt Ltd manages Fortune Select Palms, Radisson Blu. Hotel industry saw ₹3,290 crore transactions in 2023, driven by wedding, MICE demand.
